mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, member_name, member_password, member_gender, member_email, member_nickname, member_role, member_address, member_latitude, member_longitude, signup_date) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{memberName}, #{memberPassword}, #{memberGender}, #{memberEmail}, #{memberNickname}, #{memberRole}, #{memberAddress}, #{memberLatitude}, #{memberLongitude}, #{signupDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET member_email = #{memberEmail}, member_nickname = #{memberNickname}, member_address = #{memberAddress}, member_latitude = #{memberLatitude}, member_longitude = #{memberLongitude} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_id = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_nickname = #{value}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE member_email = #{value}
